content: Hey @Philip Durbin I just sent an invite link for Zulip to the German Dataverse Interest Group after promoting the idea about trying this out during today's meeting. Welcome y'all!

I spread the word about Zulip during the containerization kickoff yesterday as well as in the followup email I sent afterwards: https://groups.google.com/g/dataverse-community/c/3vJWcAK5F7M/m/h63JizJKBgAJ
Is this the right time to ask the community if Slack is really the place to be? https://dataversecommunity.slack.com/archives/C5V66TV6Y/p1683568455093139
I can't even see that message now that it has been over 90 days, which is exactly the problem! See also https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/issues/8712
I started a topic about the future of dataversecommunity.slack.com over at #community > dataversecommunity.slack.com
